jpn.official: ヨルダン·ハシミテ王国

flags.alt: The flag of Jordan is composed of three equal horizontal bands of black, white and green, with a red isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle has its base on the hoist end, spans about half the width of the field and bears a small seven-pointed white star at its center.

name.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

cal.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

eng.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

altSpellings: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

cym.official: Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands

fra.official: Commonwealth des îles Mariannes du Nord

por.official: Comunidade das Ilhas Marianas do Norte

spa.official: Mancomunidad de las Islas Marianas del Norte

flags.alt: The flag of Serbia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, blue and white. The coat of arms of Serbia is superimposed at the center of the field slightly towards the hoist side.
The flag of Andorra features three equal vertical bands of blue, yellow and red, with the coat of arms of Andorra centered in the yellow band.

jpn.official: タークス·カイコス諸島
jpn.common: タークス・カイコス諸島

flags.alt: The flag of Bolivia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, yellow and green, with the national coat of arms centered in the yellow band.

fra.official: Grande République arabe libyenne populaire et socialiste

flags.alt: The flag of Libya is composed of three horizontal bands of red, black and green, with the black band twice the height of the other two bands. At the center of the black band is a fly-side facing white crescent and a five-pointed white star placed just outside the crescent opening.
The flag of Mali is composed of three equal vertical bands of green, yellow and red.
The flag of Armenia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, blue and orange.
The flag of Mauritius is composed of four equal horizontal bands of red, blue, yellow and green.
The flag of Maldives has a red field, at the center of which is a large green rectangle bearing a fly-side facing white crescent.

altSpellings: The former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of

flags.alt: The flag of North Macedonia has a red field, at the center of which is a golden-yellow sun with eight broadening rays that extend to the edges of the field.

jpn.official: エチオピア連邦民主共和国

zho.official: 埃塞俄比亚联邦民主共和国

flags.alt: The flag of Ethiopia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of green, yellow and red, with the national emblem superimposed at the center of the field. The national emblem comprises a light blue circle bearing a golden-yellow pentagram with single yellow rays emanating from the angles between the points of the pentagram.
The flag of Iraq is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, white and black. In the central white band are Arabic inscriptions in green.
The flag of Guatemala is composed of three equal vertical bands of light blue, white and light blue, with the national coat of arms centered in the white band.

jpn.official: トリニダード·トバゴ共和国
jpn.common: トリニダード・トバゴ

zho.official: 特立尼达和多巴哥共和国

flags.alt: The flag of Trinidad and Tobago has a red field with a white-edged black diagonal band that extends from the upper hoist-side corner to the lower fly-side corner of the field.
The flag of Peru is composed of three equal vertical bands of red, white and red, with the national emblem centered in the white band.
The flag of Suriname is composed of five horizontal bands of green, white, red, white and green in the ratio of 2:1:4:1:2. A large five-pointed yellow star is centered in the red band.
The flag of Sweden has a blue field with a large golden-yellow cross that extend to the edges of the field. The vertical part of this cross is offset towards the hoist side.

jpn.official: フランス領ポリネシア
jpn.common: フランス領ポリネシア

flags.alt: The flag of Benin features a green vertical band on its hoist side that takes up about two-fifth the width of the field and two equal horizontal bands of yellow and red adjoining the vertical band.
The flag of Estonia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of blue, black and white.

jpn.common: フォークランド（マルビナス）諸島

flags.alt: The flag of Zimbabwe is composed of seven equal horizontal bands of green, yellow, red, black, red, yellow and green, with a white isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle is edged in black, spans about one-fourth the width of the field and has its base on the hoist end. A yellow Zimbabwe bird superimposed on a five-pointed red star is centered in the triangle.
The flag of Slovakia is composed of three equal horizontal bands of white, blue and red. The coat of arms of Slovakia is superimposed at the center of the field slightly towards the hoist side.
The flag of the Netherlands is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, white and blue.

The flag of Ecuador is composed of the horizontal bands of yellow, blue and red, with the yellow band twice the height of the other two bands. The Ecuadorian coat of arms is superimposed in the center of the field.

The flag of Saudi Arabia has a green field, at the center of which is an Arabic inscription — the Shahada — in white above a white horizontal sabre with its tip pointed to the hoist side of the field.

The flag of United Arab Emirates features a red vertical band on its hoist side that takes up about one-fourth the width of the field and three equal horizontal bands of green, white and black adjoining the vertical band.

jpn.official: アフガニスタン·イスラム共和国

flags.alt: The flag of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan has a white field with Arabic inscriptions — the Shahada — in black across its center.

ces.official: Menší odlehlé ostrovy Spojených států amerických

hun.official: Az Amerikai Egyesült Államok lakatlan külbirtokai
hun.common: Az Amerikai Egyesült Államok lakatlan külbirtokai

ita.common: Isole minori esterne degli Stati Uniti d'America

jpn.official: アメリカ合衆国外諸島

nld.official: Kleine afgelegen eilanden van de Verenigde Staten
nld.common: Kleine afgelegen eilanden van de Verenigde Staten

per.official: جزایر کوچک حاشیه‌ای ایالات متحده آمریکا
per.common: جزایر کوچک حاشیه‌ای ایالات متحده آمریکا

por.common: Ilhas Menores Distantes dos Estados Unidos

spa.official: Estados Unidos Islas menores alejadas de
spa.common: Islas Ultramarinas Menores de Estados Unidos

srp.official: Мала спољна острва Сједињених Америчких Држава
srp.common: Мала спољна острва Сједињених Америчких Држава

swe.official: Förenta staternas mindre öar i Oceanien och Västindien
swe.common: Förenta staternas mindre öar i Oceanien och Västindien

tur.official: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri Küçük Dış Adaları
tur.common: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri Küçük Dış Adaları

flags.alt: The flag of Central African Republic is composed of four equal horizontal bands of blue, white, green and yellow intersected at the center by a vertical red band of equal size as the horizontal bands. A yellow five-pointed star is situated on the hoist side of the blue band.

The flag of Panama is composed of four equal rectangular areas — a white rectangular area with a blue five-pointed star at its center, a red rectangular area, a white rectangular area with a red five-pointed star at its center, and a blue rectangular area — in the upper hoist side, upper fly side, lower fly side and lower hoist side respectively.

The flag of Vatican City is square shaped. It is composed of two equal vertical bands of yellow and white, with national coat of arms centered in the white band. The national coat of arms comprises the Papal Tiara superimposed on two crossed keys.

jpn.common: シリア・アラブ共和国

flags.alt: The flag of Syria is composed of three equal horizontal bands of red, white and black. At the center of the white band are two small five-pointed green stars arranged in a horizontal line.

The flag of Vanuatu is composed of two equal horizontal bands of red and green, with a black isosceles triangle superimposed on the hoist side of the field. This triangle has its base on the hoist end, spans about two-fifth the width of the field and is enclosed on its sides by the arms of a thin black-edged yellow horizontally oriented Y-shaped band which extends along the boundary of the red and green bands to the fly end of the field. A yellow boar's tusk encircling two yellow crossed namele leaves is centered in the triangle.

The flag of Honduras is composed of three equal horizontal bands of turquoise, white and turquoise, with five small five-pointed turquoise stars arranged in a quincuncial pattern at the center of the white band.

name.official: Independent and Sovereign Republic of Kiribati

eng.official: Independent and Sovereign Republic of Kiribati

cym.official: Independent and Sovereign Republic of Kiribati

ita.official: Repubblica indipendente e sovrano di Kiribati

jpn.official: キリバスの独立と主権共和国

por.official: Independente e soberano República de Kiribati

spa.official: República Independiente y Soberano de Kiribati

flags.alt: The flag of Kiribati is divided into two halves. While the upper half has a red field, at the center of which is a yellow frigate bird flying over the top half of a rising yellow sun with seventeen visible rays, the lower half is composed of six horizontal wavy bands of white alternating with blue to depict the ocean.

The flag of Chile is composed of two equal horizontal bands of white and red, with a blue square of the same height as the white band superimposed in the canton. A white five-pointed star is centered in the blue square.
The flag of Burkina Faso features two equal horizontal bands of red and green, with a yellow five-pointed star in the center.
